      • getColor

        public static int getColor(android.content.Context context,
                           int colorId)
        Returns a color associated with a particular resource ID

        Starting in Build.VERSION_CODES.M, the returned color will be styled for the specified Context's theme.

        Parameters:
        colorId - The desired resource identifier, as generated by the aapt tool. This integer encodes the package, type, and resource entry. The value 0 is an invalid identifier.
        Returns:
        A single color value in the form 0xAARRGGBB.
